entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -30.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
